name: Doomed Drone Defence
description:
Defend your precious generator against an army of drones as numerous as they are evil!

Upgrade after each failed attempt to keep pushing your survival high-score to new heights.

Controls:

- Mouse and Keyboard

Game Includes:

- 54 in-game upgrades across 12 areas.

- 3 enemy types that appear as you get deeper into your survival runs.

- More droids than you can shake a laser beam at.

My 2nd gamejam submission. Made for Ludum Dare 50.

All audio used is under the CC0 creative commons license, everything else was done by me from scratch.

Software:

- Unity 2020.3.26f1

- Aseprite v1.2.34

- Pyxel edit v0.4.95
